transcript: Summer. I like summer. I like going to the beach, spending time with the family, outside, exploring. Yeah.

question: Do you like animals?
transcript: much, especially dogs. I had dogs, in my life, but, my main issue was my mom. So because she used to have allergy, I used to take them back to my grandma. At that time, I felt like I have a baby at home. Taking the dog for a haircut, the doctor, the, the, the, the, you know, it is, I treat the dog like, like a baby.

question: Do you think that animals should be kept in zoos?
transcript: Definitely not. it is not their place. We created the zoo. So no. it is their freedom. You cannot put them in a cage where they have to sit there or the birds. it is not their place. Their place is the sky, is the forest, not the zoo.

question: Do you have any animals in your home as pets?
transcript: Now no. I used to have dogs, but now no. Because of the weather here. it is, I feel it is difficult to live. it is difficult to have a dog at home, to take the dog outside for a walk in like 50 degrees. So no, I would love to have, but no, not here. Now let talk about colors In your country what are the most popular colors I can tell you about the color of the flag You know we don have a specific color in the country The color of the flag is red white and green My favorite color is black so I don know We don have a specific color in the country Do you prefer to wear dark colors or light colors Recently both Before I used to like dark colors more Maybe when I lost weight I switched to bright and light colors Do colors affect your mood? Definitely. If, if you live in a dark room, you will feel like, everything is dark. that is why I like to have, white walls, everything white. You feel, the house is bright and, it reflects on you. So I will describe the house of my grandma.

ielts_descriptor_alignment.vocabulary_text: Uses less common and idiomatic vocabulary skilfully.

question: What it looks like?
transcript: It looks like a castle for me. it is not a castle, but for me it is like a castle. We, we have a lot of memories there. that is why I decided to talk about this house. If you like it, definitely I do. I like this house, as I mentioned, because it reminds me of my childhood and the best days we spent there and we are still spending when we go to see her. we have a lot of memories. We had good food. She used to cook a lot for us. The house is simply like, I feel like home. I just love it. And especially because it is an old house, it is still the same till now. The second I enter the house, I feel like I am back to my childhood. The memories, comes back. So yeah, as I told you, it is a big and old house. You know the old houses, you have the, how we say it, the walls are like, you feel like you are in a castle, but it is, it is, it is a house. The smell of the, the nature, the garden, everything. I like everything in this house.
